title: Rhubarb and custard ice cream sandwiches
description: As much as I love making a proper churned ice cream from scratch, I also enjoy an easy way out. This recipe is a simple no-churn variety, rippled with tangy rhubarb, then sandwiched between two crisp, custardy biscuits.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz plain flour, sifted (plus extra for dusting)
